website_summaries.verdict: A great value for this infant seat and lightweight stroller combo that performs well and has some very convenient features.
pros: Comes with the car seat for an infant
Infant seat clicks securely into the stroller
Good car seat with nice padding
cons: The max weight capacity on this stroller is only 40 pounds
Others can handle up to 50 pounds

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister who visits every month or so and am so glad I opted for this brand. Very lightweight and easy to maneuver. I put 4 stars rather than 5 because it is difficult to clip in the car-seat at times, but other than that, I have no complaints. Love the fact that the whole set (including the car base) was in one purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet, because I am still pregnant, but it was very easy to put together, seems like it's made of great material. Looking forward to using it Edit: I am very dissatisfied with this product. I do not feel that my child fits securely within the snugride 30 car seat. There's no easy was to loosen and tighten the straps which makes it extremely difficult to get my child in and out of the seat and leaves what I feel is too much room between the straps and my child's chest. If this item was still eligible for return, I would be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley F

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a lightweight, affordable carseat/stroller combo for baby #3. I just put the stroller together and so far, I like it a lot. Very light and super easy to break down. The carseat seems pretty good, though, the head support is junk.
customer_reviews.author: CasLA

customer_reviews.title: WORST EVER!
customer_reviews.text: UGHGHG!!! 1) To adjust the straps (tightening and loosening the harness), you must do so from the back of the carseat!!! It is such a hassle. I just assumed it was like my previous GRACO... but NO... A giant headache.. Especially when you are in a hurry. 2) My baby gets so hot in it. 3) Wish I could review the stroller... But they did not include some parts. I contacted them and was told they would send replacement parts. That was over a month ago. So, I have to lug the car seat and my two kids everywhere I go.
customer_reviews.author: Bb

customer_reviews.title: The Dual CarSeat/Strolle by graco for Newbornr
customer_reviews.text: This Graco Stroller Had been Refined Since I was Pushing My Daughter Around. Wow, And This Graco Stroller has Everything that my daughter wanted and a lot more than both of us expected. This Is outstanding for your Newborns and New Babies. After my last experience with Graco, I see Graco as my Family. A Graco, literally, holds those special moments in one's lives and, literally, connects generations. In a true sense, Graco is our First Science Course in Physics and Gravity. GOOO GGGRRRAAACCCOOO
customer_reviews.author: Harry Larkin

customer_reviews.title: This is worth the investment-easy to use and user friendly.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson's birth. His mother was extremely happy to receive it. She has used the car seat extensively and has, as the baby gains weight, begun to use the stroller. She really like the click system for using them in conjunction. I have found it to be a happy configuration for using on the bus as it is easy to maneuver and folds down with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice system for the cost
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful system for our upcoming bundle of joy! My husband put together the stroller without much problem, and it rolls really well, even on a carpeted surface. The car seat is still snug getting it off the base or off the stroller, but others had posted about that, so I am not surprised. It should get easier over time. I am excited to be able to use both products fully once I have my little boy at the end of the month!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: ... up at a 90° angle neither of which is comfortable for a baby or child
customer_reviews.text: The stroller has two settings either lying down or sitting up at a 90° angle neither of which is comfortable for a baby or child. The stroller is brand-new and will never be used. The car seat has been used for 10 months and the straps become so loose it is unsafe for my child and have to purchase another one way before she has reach the recommended weight limit.
customer_reviews.author: K Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Love, this was the car seat stroller combo I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love, this was the car seat stroller combo I used to my first baby girl and it was a dream. Her dad did have to show me how to get it in and out of the car, but he would of had to do so with any car seat. We ended up 'upgrading' the car seat in my car to a bigger one when she was about 10 months old that she could grow into more and eventually be turned around in but we still used this one in his car until she a year old, and the stroller can continue to be used!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Love this combo stroller carseat
customer_reviews.text: Love this combo stroller carseat. Very easy to put together. It is light weight, durable and cute. Second one I have bought. One for me one for my sister. Our kids are comfy and very secure and safe.
customer_reviews.author: leighann

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller for the price. It was a inexpensive car/stroller combo . Something were a little cheaply made on it. The cup holder in the front is very flimsy. The cup area in the back for the adult is also lose. Otherwise it serves it purpose. Great for taking Baby in and out of the car without waking the baby .
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and light
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box and assembled it. It looks very good quality and light. I bought it for my baby girl which we expect next month and we are happy with product. I gave 4 star because the price description says "you save $52"is deceptive. This product is available less than this price even in Amazon and walmart. Amazon should take out the saving part, because it is not saving.
customer_reviews.author: Ofuq

customer_reviews.title: Lasting
customer_reviews.text: It has been 2 years and both stroller and carseat are still in great working condition!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Stroller is wonderful, compact and light. Car seat leaves us wanting more. We're not new to the car seat world that's for sure so when we were expecting baby #5 we automatically went with graco again. However, the seat is definitely low quality, missing far too much (ease of adjusting straps, newborn head/body insert, no shoulder straps, padding is thin and not enough support) and I HIGHLY don't recommend using for a newborn. We will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The travel system from Graco is super convenient. Very easy to transfer baby from house ...
customer_reviews.text: The travel system from Graco is super convenient. Very easy to transfer baby from house to car seat to stroller and back. The stroller is not as big and heavy duty as some of Graco's other strollers, so that makes it lighter. I also liked the unisex color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: ksdenson

customer_reviews.title: Click connect does not work sometimes n strap in car ...
customer_reviews.text: Click connect does not work sometimes n strap in car seat comes out every now n then which is a safety issue, this is happening since past 3 months, while car seat use is just a year old, need the contact manufacturer for safety issue
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight compared to others. I personally love it. It may seem “cheap” because of the weight, but it’s very nice! Happy with this one for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Worst car seat ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hated the car seat that came with this set. You have to adjust the straps in the back. There is no easy way to tighten or loosen. Why none of these reviews say anything about it shocks me. You get used to it, but it Is the biggest inconvenience. The stroller is fine. I’m getting rid of this set after use with my first baby and getting something more convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Barker

customer_reviews.title: Love this everyday
customer_reviews.text: Perfect my daughter is 4 months old now and I love this and use it daily. Lightweight easy to use with 1 hand and I recommend to everyone about to have a baby! Only complaint is i didn't like the mini pillow it's too flat and not enough support but not a deal breaker!
customer_reviews.author: brittany fortune

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. I would love if the shade that covers baby's head could be extended more. If you lift the shade opposite end to meet with this short one, it gets hot for baby.
customer_reviews.author: heeltasticfan

customer_reviews.title: Great product at the given price
customer_reviews.text: Great product at the given price! Have used the stroller car seat combo for sometime now and it works really well! Easy to use system.
customer_reviews.author: kalpana

customer_reviews.title: Only used carseat for 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Carseat is great but my son gained weight fast and had to be switched to another seat. Wish it was easier to install in the middle seat Also the front tires lock EVERYTIME you fold it up so the wheels don't turn side to side. VERY annoying.
customer_reviews.author: chance silva

customer_reviews.title: I really like how easy it is to open and close the ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like how easy it is to open and close the stroller. I can close it with one hand and it's light enough that putting it in the trunk of the car is effortless.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Havens

customer_reviews.title: Hard to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about this stroller EXCEPT it is so hard to adjust the car seat straps.
customer_reviews.author: Makayela

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: The 2 in 1 design is convenient. With a single click, the baby car seat can be installed or uninstalled with ease. My wife and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Riverstudio

customer_reviews.title: Nice, durable, and safe units. Priced right and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Item is really nice. High quality construction and easy to assemble/use. Works other similar items as well so very versatile
customer_reviews.author: A. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great stroller combo
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great stroller combo. I love the cute design and the ease of assembly and use. We take our little one on adventures in this all the time. Couldn't live without it!
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller and car seat!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice combination stroller at a great price. Very easy assembly and great features.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Selleck

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this set. The stroller opens with ease and the car seat is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa N

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this product. It has survived the first child and caring for the second child. Sturdy, durable. Survived a number of air travels and it’s still in great condition. Worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Thelonious

customer_reviews.title: Only one cup slot for child, and it's crappy...
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to fold up and down. Cup holder is crappy. I was under the assumption it had 2 for the kid. Nope. I would have bought a different model if I had known. But, for the price, I'm not returning it over that.
customer_reviews.author: Terry R.

customer_reviews.title: Good if you are looking something at this price
customer_reviews.text: After shopping for varieties of similar product, I found it okay. Have to read manual carefully to install the stroller. I am yet to configure it fully. Good if you are looking something at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Technocrat

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I have a Britax now and it's great but this ones is so much better. So happy 😊
customer_reviews.author: Mistie Fowler

customer_reviews.title: but it she loved it and had no trouble using it
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift, but it she loved it and had no trouble using it.
customer_reviews.author: Rinn

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Love this travel system. Fits perfect in the vehicle. Adjust very well. Lightweight !!
customer_reviews.author: Zahira

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it not bulky and very durable car seat and stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: The travel system was very easy to install and set up. It's also affordable since you buy them together, or else they would be 90 bucks a piece. Installation was very simple and takes less than 30 mins. Make sure to call the company so you get on the warranty. Sometimes there are recalls and you wanna make sure your products covered. Pros: Easy to set up Affordable Graco is very well know baby products. Looks sturdy and easy to fold. Lightweight. Cons: -The front suspension system is BS. It's just plastic covering the metal frame. I've tested it and it's just wheels the lock in. Nothing fancy. -Will need additonal blankets to cover when it's cold.
customer_reviews.author: Shan Gabbar

customer_reviews.title: An amazing combination.
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful stroller and car seat. I love the colors and I love the functionality of it all. I order it a few days before Christmas and I got it on Christmas Eve. Amazon is great.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel

customer_reviews.title: love graco!
customer_reviews.text: quality as you expect from graco, we bought pretty much all the major baby items are graco brand, toddler car seat, this set, 2 playards, etc. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kevin N

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for her shower the recipient enjoyed it very much exactly what she
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for her shower the recipient enjoyed it very much exactly what she wanted
customer_reviews.author: avidreader

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put in and out of the car and into the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Diane R.

customer_reviews.title: She loved it and says it’s easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my cousin. She loved it and says it’s easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Behai

customer_reviews.title: Well done
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my baby sisters little one very handy unloading and loading the car
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great combo to buy, everything we need! Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny Easling

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Cup holder on stroller melts in the trunk?!
customer_reviews.author: Waters

customer_reviews.title: vert satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It's a great strollers and car seat combo and the price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia L. Cedillo

customer_reviews.title: easy to assembleCons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: very light-weight, easy to assemble Cons: shades on the basket is hard/noisy to adjust
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not happy with the easiness of using the product
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to assemble the car seat.The manual instruction weren't very clear.Specially about setting the inclination angle of the car seat and tightening the strap. Taking the car seat out from the car base requires multiple attempts. Overall, not happy with the easiness of using the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got difficulty in assembly. But eventually i made it through the help of my friend. Its easy to click and connect, its kinda heavy but overall its useful for me and my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Pinon

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: My niece picked this out for her baby shower gift from me and my husband and it's so cute! Arrived fast!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves to ride in the stroller even till now he is 2
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to build the stroller. Took 10 mins. The car seat came built. Love how light weight the car seat is. Cute pattern and material. Very gender neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: My daughter inlaw love the easy convenience of having it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter inlaw love the easy convenience of having it. And grandson loves being in it you couldn't of asked for anything better. Thanks James
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble and quality was good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: whitney b.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to lift and connects to other units
customer_reviews.text: Easy to lift and connects to other units. Only complaint is the storage tray cannot be installed as the screws cannot be removed. Otherwise, love it
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ancillotti

customer_reviews.title: They work perfectly fine!
customer_reviews.text: The stroller and car seat were delivered quickly and were as per specification., They work perfectly fine !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this item less than 1 star I would!! It sucks! It doesn't stay tight. The straps get loose everytime I try to tighten it!!
customer_reviews.author: Alivia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and quick to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and quick to put together. The color is neutral and can be used for either gender.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe...
customer_reviews.text: The straps in the carseat are constantly loosening up. Baby's arm can get stuck in side of stroller when going from inclined position to sitting position.Very dissapointed in the safety of these products.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, good turning radius, car seat easy to get in and out of vehicle. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: txshell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it and we can't wait to use it for our grand daughter
customer_reviews.author: pl0hgp0865

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. I couldn't be more happier to used this. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ms Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Strollers and car seat are great. It was just missing the rubber stoppers that ...
customer_reviews.text: Strollers and car seat are great. It was just missing the rubber stoppers that go on the wheels to keep the wheels on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It arrived right on time and was super easy to put together :)
customer_reviews.author: Amy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: and annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth a dime. I wd not put a baby in this. It's hard, flimsy, and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.  Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't purchase due to reviews saying It was difficult to assemble. It was EASY! The price is right and the product is great. It exceeds my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: I really like this combo pack
customer_reviews.text: I really like this combo pack. It's real simple to use, both in the car and connecting to the stroller. The fabric is really good quality, and it's definitely not cheap fabric or quality. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J.

customer_reviews.title: Great value system
customer_reviews.text: Not top quality but rugged enough. Love the 3 cup holders. Standard size storage for a large backpack underneath. Really lightweight, easy click system, easy car seat installation. Buy the extra car seat base to add to your extra car otherwise you'll be swapping out bases every time you use the other car. Assembly is pretty easy but you'll need a few tools.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Salamanca

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Car seat: -very lightweight -canopy unconfortable to open and close Stroller: -Easy to close -canopy is good -the front stray suffers when you close the stroller, because it hits the ground. -cup holder falls down and it's really small -takes a lot of space in the trunk At first i was happy with the purchase, but the fabric is really low quality, specially in the stroller. I feel the stroller fabric can break any moment, I can see through it. At the end, i think i'm going to order another model.
customer_reviews.author: Vianny

customer_reviews.title: Love this carseat and stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love this carseat and stroller! I love especially how light it is! Works perfectly for me with back problems.
customer_reviews.author: YPFearing

customer_reviews.title: Can't address ease of use but love everything else
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the baby shower I gave my nephew and his new family. We went ahead and put it together and did so rather quickly. The baby is not due for another few weeks so I can't speak to ease of use. It didn't take long for my nephew to load it in his car so folding it must have been a snap. I also can not address how easy it is to adjust car seat straps, that was a big issue for me when my grandchildren where in infant seats. I liked the weight of the car seat. It won't be too heavy when you start carrying a twenty pound baby in it. The color is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Stroller is missing the part to hold the back wheels on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Both of them loved the set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seat/stroller for both of my granddaughters. Each had a child a year apart. Both of them loved the set.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight stroller is easy to stow
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight stroller is easy to stow! Would have liked if the neck/head piece was more sturdy. I ended up rolling cloths on either side to prevent excessive movement of baby's neck.
customer_reviews.author: Sarat

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. I was impressed with the quality for the price. I was a little afraid there would be an issue since it is such an affordable set but nothing so far! Do not buy this if you are looking for a top of the line system. That's not what this is. This is a great system that isn't so cheap it doesn't feel safe and not so expensive it's painful on the wallet. It took 5 minutes to put together the stroller, so easy!
customer_reviews.author: BoyMom1718

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my son and daughter in law loved it. baby is due in 3 more months!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I figured it would be good since Graco is a reputable company
customer_reviews.text: After reading the specs I decided to purchase this. I figured it would be good since Graco is a reputable company...and I'd like to take my grandchild out for little trips to the park or shopping and not have to transfer our daughter's competitors system every time. I must admit that this had more handy features than I expected, it's quite light but stable and very easy to transport and interchange the car seat to and from both the vehicle and stroller. I am quite impressed.
customer_reviews.author: sheree

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandbaby and it's pretty sufficient. It's pretty standard. Nothing to fancy but safe and very comfortable for the baby. We'very gotten plenty of uses outta the car seat but hv only used the stroller twice but Both seem to be pretty great. Good buy at a good price. I'm satisfied :)
customer_reviews.author: Mahogany Wren

customer_reviews.title: My son and his girlfriend love it.
customer_reviews.text: It was for my new grandson. My son and his girlfriend love it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is not ok i am still struggling to fix the stroller
customer_reviews.text: There are some parts that are missing, Attach HUB Adapter onto wheel is missing with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Murali

customer_reviews.title: Extremely lightweight and manueverable
customer_reviews.text: This is the lightest, smallest, and easiest stroller to push that I've ever had, but it's difficult to click in the car seat. It also has a removable cup holder in the kid's tray that never stays in, so we end up not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo

customer_reviews.title: Not great!
customer_reviews.text: In a mid price range this product is also of a mediocre quality! Although Graco brand but the material used on the seats and the cushioning are not good nor are the tires. The navigation of the stroller is not easy or smooth. It is not the best of quality even in terms of safety. I would suggest parents to spend a few more bucks and get a little better product!
customer_reviews.author: Amarpreet Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Effective but ...
customer_reviews.text: I am all for this product for safety and convenience reasons but setup was a bit cumbersome even with the booklet provided because apparently there's multiple versions of this product so it wasn't totally specific to mine. Also as a new mom and having undergone surgery, this is heavy to lift on my own when I'm not supposed to be lifting anything heavier than my baby and I use public transport. For those two reasons I deduct a star but otherwise the product has been lovely so far. As I heal more I suppose I will get more use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Laylz

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this car-seat stroller combo! Not only is it good looking but it was super easy to put together and there really wasn't anything confusing about how it worked or anything. Honestly, you barely need the instructions! This is the first car-seat and the first stroller I have ever bought being a first time mom) and I am very happy with my choice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recalled?
customer_reviews.text: The person I bought this for told me it was recalled and they are currently fighting to get the money back on this order.
customer_reviews.author: MaKayla

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Stroller is fine. Works well and lightweight. I despise the car seat. There is no strap on the front to tighten or loosen the seat. It doesn't make any sense whatsoever. You have to put your baby in the seat and then reach around to tighten or loosen. It's the absolute dumbest thing. I would return this but we got rid of the box and I don't have time to return this with an infant at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient set. Easy to put together. The stroller is great, easy to fold/unfold with one hand. Car seat is super light which is always a plus, seeing as my son weighed 10lbs at birth! Only downfall is the stroller only has to recline positions, which doesnt pose a oroblem as of yet, seeing as we still use ut with the carseat attached
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight stroller combo
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lightweight travel system. The car seat is not that difficult to figure out as well as the adjustment straps. I chose this over many others due to the fact that it was super light. I'm shorter and the push bar is the perfect height!
customer_reviews.author: vjkimmel

customer_reviews.title: Mistake- I thought Graco was a quality company
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. Support straps too short. It's a tight fit for a 20 lb. baby. The connections are hard to operate and the sunshade pops off easily. I would have returned it but I bought it early at the baby's birth and did not take it out of the box for a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Answerlady

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my new born. Car seat is fine. However, Stroller was a complete different story. I tried to put it together yesterday to take my new born to his first doctors appointment. Task that should have take 15 min to assemble the stroller turned into frustrating experience when I found during the middle of assembly that the box was was missing the real wheel adapters that you need before you can put the wheels on. Unfortunately, I couldn't assembly. I have called the manufacturer and they told me that the are out of parts until July. Anyhow, unnecessary aggravation from a well known brand. It's just shame. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: hubby put it together quickly and it folds up nicely. I love this set and the price was ...
customer_reviews.text: hubby put it together quickly and it folds up nicely. I love this set and the price was great with my registry discount. can't wait to put my son in it
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beat It
customer_reviews.text: This Graco LiteRider system is as expected Graco quality. It works just like it is supposed to and made in a quality way. All of the parts fit and function as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: FunCouple

customer_reviews.title: but overall great product!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little difficult to put together, but overall great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Better than I could have hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously in love with this combo! We bought this for our third child and I couldn't be happier. The entire thing was easy to put together (my husband had to snap the wheels in place, you need some muscle to do so). The seat is the lightest we have ever had and fits perfectly in the stroller. The stroller easily folds up, but in such a way that my 4 year old can't collapse it. It has a larger then expected mesh basket underneath. Both sest and syroller use an easy to clean cloth. I can't wait for baby to arrive so I can put it to use!
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: but overall it is great and the anchor is awesome so I don't have ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a but more padded, but overall it is great and the anchor is awesome so I don't have to put the seat belt on my daughter's chair Everytime you just set it in there make sure it clicks and done. The stroller is SUPER light so going for walks is awesome since there's a lot of hills by my house.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: I will only use the car seat in the stroller ...
customer_reviews.text: I will only use the car seat in the stroller or use it in a shopping cart. I DO NOT feel confident that my granddaughter will be protected enough to use it in a car.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, looks good, works great, does the job!
customer_reviews.author: MariMR

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and easy to use. The only thing I did not like was when you use a clip to hold your purse or bag and baby and carseat aren't in place, the whole thing tips over. Overall great for the price and baby loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing part. I have to go thru all return ...
customer_reviews.text: Missing part .I have to go thru all return Hassel .
customer_reviews.author: Biren / Neha

customer_reviews.title: Horribly designed harness tightening/loosening straps!!
customer_reviews.text: I am pg with my 5th baby, I am a veteran car seat mom :) I CANNOT believe this car seat got such good reviews! It's cute and seems safe and functional BUT the fact you have to tighten and loosen the harness straps from the backside and with such awkward snaps and placing I think this car seat is HORRIBLY designed in this regard and cannot believe no one else is baffled and disgusted by such a stupid strap/harness design! I am sending it back asap!!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

product_meta.title: Graco LiteRider Click Connect Travel System, Sully
product_meta.description:
Stay light and ultra-mobile with the Graco LiteRider Click Connect Travel System. It includes the LiteRider Click Connect Stroller and the top-rated SnugRide Click Connect 30 infant car seat for a baby from 4-30 lb, which connects to the stroller with a secure, one-second attachment. There are plenty of convenience features to keep you and baby happy, including a parent's and child's tray with cupholders and a large basket. You'll also appreciate the one-hand fold and lightweight design (it weighs less than 17.7 pounds), and the padded, 2-level reclining seat ensures a comfortable ride for baby.

BRAND STORY
By Graco
feature_bullets: Graco travel system includes the top-rated Graco SnugRide Click Connect 30 Infant Car Seat (rear facing from 4-30 lbs. and up to 30") and LiteRider Click Connect Stroller
Click Connect system provides a one-step, secure attachment with the infant car seat stroller combo
Ultra-lightweight stroller weighs less than 17.7 lb, so it's easy for moms on-the-go
Parent's tray with cup holder and storage holds your essentials for on-the-go convenience
Child's tray with cup holder pivots for no-fuss stroller entry

specifications.Folded size: 33.07 W x 26.75 D x 19.29 H inches
